import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk assign tickets"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/assign"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Assigns multiple tickets to a user or team in a single bulk operation. This is more efficient than individual assignments when processing large batches of tickets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find tickets and collect `Items[].TicketId` values.
2. **AssignToUserId or TeamId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/users/search-users) to find the target user, or [GET /api/v1.0/teams](/docs/api/teams/list-teams) for team assignment.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with criteria → collect `TicketId` array
2. Find assignee: [POST /api/v1.0/search](/docs/api/search/global-search) → extract `UserId`
3. Bulk assign: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/assign](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-assign-tickets) with ticket IDs and assignee
4. Verify: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with assignee filter to confirm

**Request Body**: Provide `TicketIds` array and either `AssignToUserId` or `TeamId`.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket) – Single ticket assignment
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-issue](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-set-ticket-issue) – Bulk issue update
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/delete](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-delete-tickets) – Bulk delete

  as={"h2"}

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for bulk assigning tickets to a user or team.","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","description":"Array of ticket identifiers to assign.","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"minItems":1},"Request":{"type":"object","description":"Assignment target details.","properties":{"AssignToUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User ID to assign tickets to.","nullable":true},"AssignToTeamId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Team ID to assign tickets to.","nullable":true}}}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"example":{"TicketIds":["260b8773-dcad-f011-8e61-000d3a7bb518","370c9884-edbe-f011-9f72-111e4a8cc629"],"Request":{"AssignToUserId":"1eb32e06-b79f-f011-b484-002248538047"}},"title":"BulkAssignTicketsRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
